entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Allow inserting FQN instead of importing namespace on completion #72363
  • Cloning a .NET 8 record deriving from a .NET 7 record leads to loss of members #72357
  • [Question] How to use functionality from nuget packages in project referenced source generator #72356
  • Improve error recovery on missing type or identifier for property declaration #72354
    Backlog

Closed

  • [VB] `CInt(Math.Round(doubleValue, MidPointRounding.AwayFromZero))` and `CInt` for rounding methods for `Decimal` are not optimized #71819

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge the finally block during data flow analysis #72361
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Roslyn non-source-only build fixes #72360
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update VS SDK to 17.10.22-preview-1 #72359
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations in InputNodes by specifying initial capacity #72358
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #72352
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update PublishData for VS 17.10P2 snap #72351
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Simplify IStreamingFindUsagesPresenter.StartSearch API #72343
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations in lexer #72243
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations in NodeStateTable.GetPackedState #72355
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Small optimization around ProjectState modification operations #72313
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Disable CodeQL in unofficial builds #72302
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #72342
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to release/dev17.10 #72349
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Address timing issue recently in CreateCompilationTrackerMap #72350
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce symbol array allocations during CSharpSemanticModel.LookupSymbolsInternal #72153

Updated

  • Razor internals #71762
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ExternalAccess.VisualDiagnostics #72296
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Find usage message severity #72326
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Initial proposal for artifacts #71781
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement module cancellation and stack probing instrumentations #71896
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` (attempt 2) #71793
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix compiler vsix deployment #72321
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement GetInterceptorMethod public API #72279
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Incorporate underlying type's hierarchy into overload resolution #72155
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Support parsing for `allows` constraint #72346
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Defer array creation in ConcurrentCache. #72291
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [VB] Improve casting from floating-point or decimal types to integer types in more cases #71838
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Check PublishData.json feeds #72333
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump roslyn-sdk and System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #72242
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Explicitly use dotnet pwsh in scripts #72341
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support for features in Copilot Chat #72097
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Make Workspaces.MSBuild build with a netstandard target #72257
    Area-IDE, untriaged
